00039 // To construct an error_code after a CUDA Runtime error:
00040 //
00041 //   error_code(::cudaGetLastError(), cuda_category())
00042 
00043 // XXX N3000 prefers enum class cuda_errc { ... }
00044 namespace cuda_errc
00045 {
00046 
00047 enum cuda_errc_t
00048 {
00049   // from cuda/include/driver_types.h
00050   // mirror their order
00051   success                      = cudaSuccess,
00052   missing_configuration        = cudaErrorMissingConfiguration,
00053   memory_allocation            = cudaErrorMemoryAllocation,
00054   initialization_error         = cudaErrorInitializationError,
00055   launch_failure               = cudaErrorLaunchFailure,
00056   prior_launch_failure         = cudaErrorPriorLaunchFailure,
00057   launch_timeout               = cudaErrorLaunchTimeout,
00058   launch_out_of_resources      = cudaErrorLaunchOutOfResources,
00059   invalid_device_function      = cudaErrorInvalidDeviceFunction,
00060   invalid_configuration        = cudaErrorInvalidConfiguration,
00061   invalid_device               = cudaErrorInvalidDevice,
00062   invalid_value                = cudaErrorInvalidValue,
00063   invalid_pitch_value          = cudaErrorInvalidPitchValue,
00064   invalid_symbol               = cudaErrorInvalidSymbol,
00065   map_buffer_object_failed     = cudaErrorMapBufferObjectFailed,
00066   unmap_buffer_object_failed   = cudaErrorUnmapBufferObjectFailed,
00067   invalid_host_pointer         = cudaErrorInvalidHostPointer,
00068   invalid_device_pointer       = cudaErrorInvalidDevicePointer,
00069   invalid_texture              = cudaErrorInvalidTexture,
00070   invalid_texture_binding      = cudaErrorInvalidTextureBinding,
00071   invalid_channel_descriptor   = cudaErrorInvalidChannelDescriptor,
00072   invalid_memcpy_direction     = cudaErrorInvalidMemcpyDirection,
00073   address_of_constant_error    = cudaErrorAddressOfConstant,
00074   texture_fetch_failed         = cudaErrorTextureFetchFailed,
00075   texture_not_bound            = cudaErrorTextureNotBound,
00076   synchronization_error        = cudaErrorSynchronizationError,
00077   invalid_filter_setting       = cudaErrorInvalidFilterSetting,
00078   invalid_norm_setting         = cudaErrorInvalidNormSetting,
00079   mixed_device_execution       = cudaErrorMixedDeviceExecution,
00080   cuda_runtime_unloading       = cudaErrorCudartUnloading,
00081   unknown                      = cudaErrorUnknown,
00082   not_yet_implemented          = cudaErrorNotYetImplemented,
00083   memory_value_too_large       = cudaErrorMemoryValueTooLarge,
00084   invalid_resource_handle      = cudaErrorInvalidResourceHandle,
00085   not_ready                    = cudaErrorNotReady,
00086   insufficient_driver          = cudaErrorInsufficientDriver,
00087   set_on_active_process_error  = cudaErrorSetOnActiveProcess,
00088   no_device                    = cudaErrorNoDevice,
00089   ecc_uncorrectable            = cudaErrorECCUncorrectable,
00090   startup_failure              = cudaErrorStartupFailure
00091 }; // end cuda_errc_t
00092 
00093 
00094 } // end namespace cuda_errc
00095 
00096 
00097 // XXX N3000 prefers is_error_code_enum<cuda_errc>
00098 template<> struct is_error_code_enum<cuda_errc::cuda_errc_t> : thrust::detail::true_type {};

00104 inline error_code make_error_code(cuda_errc::cuda_errc_t e);
